section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
TIRESIAS SA is a consumer credit reporting agency specifying in the collection and aggregation of information on consumers and businesses which provides to the banking sector and the market. 
The main objectives of TIRESIAS are:   
1.The development and operation of information systems aiming at: 
•promoting and safeguarding the statute of credit provided by banks 
•assuring reliable transactions and, consequently, the smooth functioning of the market  
•contributing to the reduction of insolvency risks for the benefit of the banking system and its clients 
•contributing to the protection of citizens against fraud. 
 
2.The management and provision of products and services produced by its information systems.
